title: Asobi Asobase OVA
opening_song: "Three-Piece (スリピス)" by Hanako Honda (Hina Kino), Olivia (Rika Nagae), Kasumi Nomura (Konomi Kohara)
ending_song: "Inkya Impulse (インキャインパルス)" by Hanako Honda (Hina Kino), Olivia (Rika Nagae), Kasumi Nomura (Konomi Kohara) feat. Ikepy & KSKN
sinopse: Included with seventh volume of the Asobi Asobase manga.
